metadata.title: CVE-2016-10033 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The mailSend function in the isMail transport in PHPMailer before 5.2.18 might allow remote attackers to pass extra parameters to the mail command and consequently execute arbitrary code via a \" (backslash double quote) in a crafted Sender property.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10033` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-phpmailer - 5.2.14+dfsg-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libphp-phpmailer package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.14+dfsg-2.1').
